Created an attachment (id=68921)

Looks like some illegal projections got added to the projection model. Do you have reproducible steps?

Moving to Ant as the projection structure is provided by the specific editor and not by Platform Text.

It looks like this happened upon Undo.
Unfortunately I do not have steps. I have tried again the exact same things and it did not reproduce the problem.

Unfortunately that's the hard part when it comes to such errors in projection or syntax highlighting: if the original file that produces the wrong structure isn't at hand then it's very hard to detect.
